DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical study evaluate CARESTREAM Vue PACS 12.1.5 Computed Tomography ( CT ) Perfusion ( `` investigational device '' ) image performance . Evaluation CT Perfusion ( CTP ) image compare CTP predicate device , Olea Sphere PACS CT Perfusion Module .
DOC.brief_title: CARESTREAM Vue PACS v12.1.5 CT Perfusion Clinical Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: This study demonstrate safety effectiveness CTP assessment 30 CTP de-identified patient case collect retrospectively . The map include follow : - Mean Transfer Time ( MTT ) - time contrast material stay tissue - Cerebral Blood Volume ( CBV ) - volume blood know volume tissue base concentration contrast material tissue time - Cerebral Blood Flow ( CBF ) - describes flow blood affected tissue - Time To Peak ( TTP ) - time maximum enhancement achieve volume tissue The retrospective data collect patient include non-contrast head CT exam complete day CTP image , follow-up head CT least 1-2 day initial image study ( initial non-contrast head CT ) available .
